DOC.brief_summary: To investigate efficacy safety flexibly dose adjunctive brexpiprazole treatment active adult MDD , 18 35 year old , experience inadequate selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( SSRI ) /serotonin norepinephrine reuptake inhibitor ( SNRI ) response school work environment .
DOC.brief_title: Brexpiprazole ( OPC-34712 ) Adjunctive Treatment Active Adults , 18 35 Years Old , With Major Depressive Disorder Who Are School Work Environment
DOC.criteria: Main Have diagnosis single recurrent , nonpsychotic episode MDD define Diagnostic Statistical Manual Mental Disorders , Fourth Edition , Text Revision ( DSMIVTR ) confirm Mini International Neuropsychiatric Interview ( M.I.N.I . ) adequate clinical psychiatric evaluation . Have treatment history inadequate ADT response least 1 ADT ( > 3 ) current episode . Have receive single , trialapproved , SSRI SNRI adequate dose ≥ 6 week prior screen . Are 18 35 year old time consent ( inclusive , outpatient ) . Are ( ) work 20 hour per week student take 6 credit hour trial period , however minor deviation `` parttime '' concept may acceptable casebycase basis base approval medical monitor . Have Hamilton Depression Rating Scale ( HAMD ) 17item Total Score ≥ 18 screen baseline . Have Sheehan Disability Scale ( SDS ) 3item mean score ≥ 5 baseline . Main Subjects follow current Axis I DSMIVTR diagnosis : delirium , dementia , amnestic , cognitive disorder ; schizophrenia , schizoaffective disorder , psychotic disorder ; bipolar I disorder , bipolar II disorder , bipolar disorder otherwise specify ( NOS ) ; eat disorder ( include anorexia nervosa bulimia ) ; obsessive compulsive disorder ; panic disorder ; posttraumatic stress disorder ; attention deficit hyperactivity disorder . Subjects follow current Axis II DSMIVTR diagnosis : borderline , antisocial , paranoid , schizoid , schizotypal histrionic personality disorder , mental retardation .
